title: officerExtras 0.0.0.9001
text: main change update functions now support full range officer class objects work pptx xlsx well docx files. read_docx_ext() now wrapper general read_officer() function. write_docx() replaced write_officer() update also includes two new functions vectorized versions add_to_body(): add_value_with_keys() add_str_with_keys(). add_to_body() updated fixes improvements making keyword, id, + index parameters optional using officer::body_add_par() default officer::body_add() (due odd error messages using latter lack support pos parameter). Finally, test coverage currently around 64% seems like good start new package.
